instructions.ar: انعطف يساراً قليلاًا على Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej svagt til højre vid Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Leicht rechts abbiegen an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Turn slight right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Gira a levemente a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Al final de la calle gira ligeramente a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Käänny loivasti oikeaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה קלה ימינה על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon be enyhén jobbra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Turn agak ke kanan at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Gira a destra leggermente al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossing​ပေါ်သို့ ညာဘက် အနည်းငယ်ကိုလှည့်ပါ
instructions.nl: Ga iets naar rechts bij Shibuya Crossing
instructions.no: Sving litt til høyre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć łagodnie w prawo na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-BR: Vire suave à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ro: Virați ușor dreapta la Shibuya Crossing

instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно праворуч на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải nghiêng ở Shibuya Crossing
